Body: Date: Thu, 21 Nov 1996 22:14:14 GMT Server: Apache/1.1.1 Content-type: text/html Content-length: 1908 Last-modified: Thu, 24 Oct 1996 23:40:48 GMT David Koller David Koller David Koller is a research assistant at the Graphics, Visualization, and Usability Center in the College of Computing at the Georgia Institute of Technology (which was recently rated the top computer science graphics and HCI graduate program in the nation!
